translated: The Chapter on the Conditions🔽The Section on the Triad and Duad

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽16.55. Sanidassanattika, Rūpīduka🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ rūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho narūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ arūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naarūpī dhammo🔽uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ arūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sani dassana ttika rūpī duka  anidassana appaṭigham rūpim dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  anidassana appaṭigham arūpim dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na arūpī dhammo  uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham arūpim dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: naarūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ arūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca🔽nasanidassanasappaṭigho naarūpī ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naarūpī ca dhammā uppajjanti🔽hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: na arūpī dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham arūpim dhammam paṭicca 🔽na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na arūpī ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na arūpī ca dhammā uppajjanti 🔽hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe avigate cha
